quest.name: Pick Their Poison
journal:
 Quest Sync
Despite having his father's sword, you suspect Karnes is not yet ready to return.
objectives: Place the poisoned meat at the designated locations.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: His father meant the world to him. He may not look it, but he's elated to have that sword.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: Words can't explain how grateful I am... Thank you.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: Sorry we put you through all this. Karnes seems well enough to walk now, so I'll see him back to Slitherbough.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: Actually, there's one last thing I wish to do while we're here.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: If we're ever to rebuild Fort Gohn, something has to be done about the animals that wander about the ruins.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: Which is why I boiled meat in a stew of poisonous mushrooms and snake venom. I was planning to place it around the ruins for the raptors to eat.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: Are you crazy!? Master Matoya said─

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: Master Matoya isn't here, and no one ever goes to Fort Gohn, so they'll never have to know. We'll cover the west side of the ruins, you take the east.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: Just the smell of it makes my stomach turn. I almost feel bad for the raptors...

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: Good, you've finished. Our side is taken care of as well.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: We should leave before our clothes begin to smell of the stuff.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: It's good to be back. I hope we haven't been too much of a bother.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: Sorry again for dragging you into my troubles.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: I'm just glad you weren't seriously hurt. You better tell me the next time you plan to do something crazy like that.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: There won't be a next time, I promise. I can't afford to be reckless if I'm ever to be a match for my father.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: Thank you again for all your help.

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: It's only a pile of rubble now, but someday I'll rebuild Fort Gohn. You wait and see.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: You mean we'll rebuild Fort Gohn. It's my home too, you know.

dialogue.name: VARTHON
dialogue.text: For all the people who were forced to abandon their homes. For your father...

dialogue.name: KARNES
dialogue.text: You'll come and visit, won't you? We can hold a grand feast in your honor─to the womanman who helped make it all possible.
